ai-thag6.14:1.1_0: This two-legged body is dirty and stinking,
ai-thag6.14:1.3_0: full of flocks of many corpses,
ai-thag6.14:2.1_0: Like a lurking deer by a trick,
ai-thag6.14:2.2_0: like a fish by a hook,
ai-thag6.14:3.3_0: these five kinds of sensual stimulation
ai-thag6.14:3.4_0: are seen in a woman’s body.
ai-thag6.14:4.1_0: Those who stand at this time,
ai-thag6.14:4.3_0: they swell the horrors of the charnel ground,
ai-thag6.14:5.2_0: having seen a snake, glorious head,
ai-thag6.14:6.1_0: Seeing the danger in sensual pleasures,
ai-thag6.14:6.4_0: and attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag6.14:6.7_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
ai-thag6.14:7.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
